name: Anthropology and the Indigenous Peoples of Turtle Island (North America)
description: This course will examine the relationship between the field of anthropology and Indigenous people of Turtle Island (i.e. North America). We will examine the past, present, and future manifestations of this relationship. This course will emphasize Indigenous, decolonial, and community scholars. Students will be encouraged to think critically and reflect on their own world views. [24L]
